meanings.sent1: The coffee at the bottom of the pot was the dreggiest.
meanings.sent2: After the storm, the river was filled with the dreggiest debris.
meanings.sent3: The dreggiest part of the soup was left untouched by everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt like the dreggiest pond, murky and stagnant.
meanings.sent5: The dreggiest memories floated to the surface, unwanted but persistent.

meanings.sent1: It was the dreggiest day of the year, with rain pouring non-stop.
meanings.sent2: The alley behind the restaurant was the dreggiest place in town.
meanings.sent3: His room was the dreggiest in the house, cluttered and dusty.
meanings.sent4: The dreggiest thoughts filled his mind, clouding his judgment.
meanings.sent5: The dreggiest part of the story was yet to be revealed, hidden in shadows.
